articles.title: Trudeau to meet with Biden, Google chief on Day 2 of Summit of the Americas - CTV News
articles.description: It's an itinerary worthy of Hollywood: the governor of California, the man who runs Google and the president of the United States. Day 2 at the Summit of the Americas is shaping up to be a busy one for Prime Minister Justin Trudeau.
articles.content:

articles.title: "Never About Money": Johnny Depp's Lawyer Says Actor Satisfied With "Total Win" In Defamation Case - NDTV
articles.description: Actor Johnny Depp may not chase his ex-wife Amber Heard for the $10.35 million payout because he is satisfied with his "total win," his attorney Ben Chew told Good Morning America.
articles.content:
Depp was "over the moon" when the verdict was read out in his favour. (File)
